project.title: Pool Funding
project.description:
What are your funding needs? Do you need to pay off debt? Would you like to start a business?​ ​Maybe you want to buy a new car? ​ A simple daily 3 minute activity could help qualify you to pull $30,000 a month out of our Pool of Funds. ​Watch our video to learn how.

Click to join Fundwise and access a free course detailing Pool Funding.
